thread.title: British cabinet backs action against Syria

title: British cabinet backs action against Syria
text:
British cabinet backs action against Syria 8:10am EDT - 01:30 
British Prime Minister Theresa May won backing from her senior ministers to take unspecified action with the United States and France to deter further use of chemical weapons by Syria after a suspected poison gas attack on civilians. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British Prime Minister Theresa May won backing from her senior ministers to take unspecified action with the United States and France to deter further use of chemical weapons by Syria after a suspected poison gas attack on civilians.
